translations: adj.有羽冠的；有顶饰的；有饰章的
v.在……上加顶饰（crest 的过去分词）

phrs.translation: 波峰因素；峰值系数；振幅因数

sentences.sentence: He slowed the pace as they crested the ridge.
sentences.translation: 当他们到达山脊时，他放慢了步伐。

sentences.sentence: The level of debt crested at a massive $290 billion in 1992.
To avoid hurting the thousands of crested ibises that fly near one part of the railway, protective nets have been set up along the tracks to make sure the birds will not fly into a train.
sentences.translation: 为了避免伤害在铁路附近飞行的数千只朱鹮，铁路沿线已经设置了防护网，以确保这些鸟儿不会飞进火车。
